text: Ritchie J. Torres (born March 12, 1988) is an American politician. He is a Democrat. In 2021, he became a member of the United States House of Representatives. From 2014 until 2021, he was a member of the New York City Council from the 15th district. He is the first openly gay candidate to be elected to legislative office in the Bronx. In July 2019, he announced his bid for the United States House of Representatives for . He won the election in November 2020. Torres was born in New York City. His father is from Puerto Rico and his mother is African-American. In March 2020, during the 2019â€“20 coronavirus pandemic, Torres tested positive for COVID-19. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:African-American politicians Category:Gay men Category:LGBT people from New York City Category:American LGBT politicians Category:People from the Bronx Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:United States representatives from New York (state)
title: Ritchie Torres
